infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses the geolocation to determine a user's location for tracking for themselves and their 'followers'.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the native camera to take pictures or access the image library to change their profile image.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app uses the user's photo library to give them an option to select from their pictures to change their profile's avatar.
